title: MediConnect Pro
description: A comprehensive telemedicine platform connecting patients with specialists. Features real-time video consultations, secure messaging, and integrated prescription management.

title: NeuroScan AI Analysis
description: An AI-powered diagnostic tool for analyzing MRI scans to detect early signs of neurological disorders. Utilizes Python-based deep learning models integrated with a web dashboard.

title: PharmaTrack Logistics
description: Supply chain management system for pharmaceutical distribution. Ensures cold-chain compliance and real-time tracking of sensitive medication deliveries.
